revised_title: Roles and Responsibilities of the Clerk, Librarian, Keeper of the Repository, and House-Keeper in the Royal Society of London
tldr: This article outlines the roles and responsibilities of the Clerk, Librarian, Keeper of the Repository, and House-Keeper in the Royal Society of London. The roles include managing the society's journals, libraries, repositories, and administrative tasks, ensuring the preservation and organization of the society's resources, and providing support to the society's meetings and events.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Library and Information Science
